title: The largest catalog of modern watch brands
import-sources: The information for the site was collected from open sources – we studied about two hundred open catalogs of large online stores, encyclopedias, forums and websites of watch enthusiasts, as well as websites and social networks of all represented brands.
import-status: Now, to confirm all the data, we are building communications with official representatives of brands, archives and museums.

contact.title: Write to us
contact.call-1: Do you know about a brand that we do not have?
contact.call-2: Or would you like to supplement the information provided by us?
contact.call-3: Or maybe you are the official representative of the brand?
contact.call-4: Write to us! We are waiting for your messages!
contact.email-motivation: Please indicate if you would like to receive our response.
contact.fail: Something went wrong and we didn't receive your message. Please try later.
